thread.title: Mike H
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Mike H

author: Mike H
title: Mike H
text: Good website, easy order placement and quick delivery. My only minor criticism would be that it's sometimes difficult to find the part you want when searching for shower spares. I recently needed a small plastic part for the valve of a Bristan thermostatic shower. I could'nt find it anywhere. In the end, I called Bristan and got them to tell me the part number of the item I needed. I then searched the Shower Doctor site using the part number and immediately found what I wanted.
